title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and payment integration.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

title: Movie Max Website
description: A website for a movie streaming platform that allows users to browse and watch movies trailer online.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations and interactive elements.

title: Expense Tracker (MERN)
description: A MERN stack application to track expenses, visualize spending, and manage budgets with authentication and charts.

title: Digital Clock with Offline Alarm
description: A modern Next.js app with multiple alarms, notifications, vibration, snooze, gradual volume increase, and offline support (PWA). Includes dark/light mode, custom alarm sounds, and more.
